biblStruct.note: The archaeological work in Syria has revealed evidence about the existence of angel’s cult in Late Antiquity, well attested by the texts of the Syriac church fathers. The majority are epigraphic documents. Less known than epigraphy, iconography also testify the spread of this cult. The image of the angels is found on buildings, especially in churches, and on devotional objects. These iconographic documents confirm widespread use of the images of the angels in Syria in the Byzantine era and the relations with the propagation of their cult in the region at that time.
